actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Communications, Technology, and the Internet

official_title: To mandate satellite carriage of qualified noncommercial educational television stations.
short_title: Satellite Consumers' Access to Public Television Digital Programming Act of 2009

summary.text: Satellite Consumers' Access to Public Television Digital Programming Act of 2009 - Amends the Communications Act of 1934 to require a satellite carrier that offers multichannel video programming distribution service to over five million subscribers to retransmit the digital signals of each noncommercial educational television station that is located in any local U.S. market.

titles.title: Satellite Consumers' Access to Public Television Digital Programming Act of 2009
To mandate satellite carriage of qualified noncommercial educational television stations.
